additional_notes: The document is a handwritten log monitoring inmate Jeffrey Epstein's activities on July 29, 2019. The log indicates that Epstein was observed sleeping or appearing to be sleeping throughout the night. There are some redactions in the document, marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'.
